China broadens law on state secrets to include 'work secrets'Chinese lawmakers have expanded Beijing's state secrets law for the first time since 2010, widening the scope of restricted sensitive information to "work secrets" according to a full text of the law published online, state media reported. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 04:13:28 GMT ZEI657CX55MWXAIMHMGFVTTQZU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-broadens-law-state-secrets-include-work-secrets-2024-02-28/Laurie Chen世界中国
South Korea, US to stage annual drills focusing on Korea nuclear threatsSouth Korea and the United States will begin their annual spring military drills next week with a focus on heading off North Korea's potential use of nuclear weapons, officials said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 04:03:18 GMT E27MVHL4PNLCRATYF2L544JI3M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-us-stage-annual-drills-focusing-korea-nuclear-threats-2024-02-28/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
With handouts, piped water and cooking gas, India's Modi woos women votersLiving in a slum in central India with her widowed mother and two young daughters, Nayantara Gupta says she owes her relative prosperity in recent years to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). Wed, 28 Feb 2024 03:25:13 GMT 6RQOJJ6AWJJBBDJRVWTB7G32CU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/with-handouts-piped-water-cooking-gas-indias-modi-woos-women-voters-2024-02-28/Shivangi Acharya世界印度
China says its coast guard patrols around Taiwan islands 'beyond reproach'China's government said on Wednesday that its coast guard patrols around a group of Taiwanese islands near the Chinese coast were "beyond reproach", and dismissed complaints the boarding of a Taiwan tourist boat had caused panic. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 03:21:15 GMT 3ZYZ2GXWG5IK5CT5CJ2TB3FZTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-its-coast-guard-patrols-around-taiwan-islands-beyond-reproach-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea's fertility rate dropped to fresh record low in 2023South Korea's fertility rate, already the world's lowest, dropped to a fresh record low in 2023, defying the billions of dollars spent by the country to try to reverse the trend as the population shrank for a fourth straight year. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 03:03:30 GMT E3JABKUMQRNR7EUI6QRVD4V3SI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-fertility-rate-dropped-fresh-record-low-2023-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indonesia's presumed president Prabowo awarded highest military honourIndonesia's outgoing president on Wednesday awarded Prabowo Subianto, his presumed successor and an ex-special forces commander, the country's highest military honour. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 02:55:16 GMT UBTLMIXEXBNMHF65QK3W6Z6S2E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-presumed-president-prabowo-awarded-highest-military-honour-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
China says Beijing and Moscow should strengthen coordination on Asia PacificChina and Russia should strengthen communication and coordination in Asia Pacific affairs and jointly safeguard regional security, stability and development, the Chinese foreign ministry reported on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 02:15:23 GMT 32QSN5CV4JMLNONMWGLV6KSAPA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-beijing-moscow-should-strengthen-coordination-asia-pacific-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Sprawling queues for subsidised rice highlight plight of Indonesia's poorIn the afternoon sun, dozens of Indonesians, mostly women, gather in a snaking queue to buy bags of subsidised rice, their arms poking through a metal gate to grab tickets assuring them a spot to make a purchase. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 01:02:23 GMT H7KXJKHPBFKRHN634WMS7V773M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/sprawling-queues-subsidished-rice-highlight-plight-indonesias-poor-2024-02-28/Dewi Kurniawati, Heru Asprihanto世界亚太地区
Chinese navy's presence in South China Sea is 'worrisome', says Philippine presidentPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Wednesday said the Chinese navy's presence in the South China Sea is "worrisome" but will not deter his country from defending its maritime territory and protecting its fishermen. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:48:04 GMT 76BQ5CUAMRPXPAABAACNRWFF4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-navys-presence-south-china-sea-is-worrisome-says-philippine-president-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
China urges largest nuclear states to negotiate a 'no-first-use' treatyStates with the largest nuclear arsenals should negotiate a treaty on no-first-use of nuclear weapons against each other or make a political statement in this regard, the Chinese foreign ministry's arms control department said. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:14:30 GMT LXZH3JSALVL37MCL32GQLSMR6I https://www.reuters.com/world/china-urges-un-define-roadmap-exempt-non-nuclear-states-nuclear-threat-state-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
Thousands told to flee homes in Australia amid heat spike, bushfire threatTens of thousands of residents in Australia's southeast were told to evacuate on Wednesday due to an intense heatwave that authorities said could further spread a massive bushfire in Victoria state, which faces its worst conditions in four years. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 23:01:18 GMT JLMUBC3TORJY5DUUGGPBQVHGKI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thousands-told-flee-homes-australia-amid-heat-spike-bushfire-threat-2024-02-27/Reuters商业环境
